QuestData.Title: Yeti to Rumble
QuestData.Description:
It would seem that the guard have been lax in patrolling the Highroad Pass. The mountain yetis have taken advantage of their absence, and now lie directly in our path.
I am no soldier, $c, so I will need to ask that you take care of them while I try to sneak past. If we can drive them off the road, at least it will make the pass safe again for travelers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Chillfur Yetis in Alpine Rise.
QuestData.CompletionText: We should drive the yetis back from the road. Having a major trade route cut off by monsters isn't going to help our fight against the coven.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thank you, $c. Keeping the pass clear will ensure a steady stream of supplies to Highroad Gate.
We will need them in the battles to come.
